name: XpathTest
description: Test suite for XPath functionality in Jsoup.

nested_classes.name: AlternateXpathFactory
nested_classes.description: Minimal, no-op implementation class to verify users can load a factory to support XPath 2.0 etc.

test_cases.name: supportsXpath
test_cases.description: Tests the XPath selection functionality on a parsed HTML document.

test_cases.name: supportsXpathFromElement
test_cases.description: Tests the XPath selection functionality starting from a specific element.

test_cases.name: emptyElementsIfNoResults
test_cases.description: Tests that an empty list is returned when no elements match the XPath query.

test_cases.name: throwsSelectException
test_cases.description: Tests that a SelectorParseException is thrown for an invalid XPath query.

test_cases.name: supportsLocalname
test_cases.description: Tests the XPath selection functionality using local-name() in an XML document.

test_cases.name: canDitchNamespaces
test_cases.description: Tests the ability to remove namespaces and select elements using local-name() in an XML document.

test_cases.name: cssAndXpathEquivalents
test_cases.description: Tests the equivalence of CSS and XPath selectors on a parsed HTML document.

test_cases.name: canSelectTextNodes
test_cases.description: Tests the ability to select text nodes using XPath in a parsed HTML document.

test_cases.name: selectByAttribute
test_cases.description: Tests the ability to select elements by attribute using XPath in a parsed HTML document.

test_cases.name: selectOutsideOfElementTree
test_cases.description: Tests the ability to select elements outside of the current element's tree using XPath.

test_cases.name: selectAncestorsOnContextElement
test_cases.description: Tests the ability to select ancestors of a context element using XPath.

test_cases.name: canSupplyAlternateFactoryImpl
test_cases.description: Tests the ability to supply an alternate XPath factory implementation.

test_cases.name: notNamespaceAware
test_cases.description: Tests the XPath selection functionality in a non-namespace-aware context.

test_cases.name: supportsPrefixes
test_cases.description: Tests the XPath selection functionality with namespace prefixes in an XML document.
